alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 23 at 10:25PM CDT until March 25 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Arkansas... Mulberry River near Mulberry affecting Franklin and Crawford Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Mulberry River near Mulberry. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, no flooding occurs but the river is swift and dangerous. Backwater from the Arkansas River may affect low lying areas near the first few miles of the Mulberry River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 3.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.5 feet early Saturday morning. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
